portfolio.title: Credit Score Evaluation of Customer Using ML
portfolio.description: Engineered a personalized credit scoring system utilizing ML algorithms, Flask, Python, and JavaScript, which led to a 17% improvement in credit evaluation accuracy and provided customized financial recommendations, resulting in a 20% increase in investment diversification among users.

portfolio.title: Memories App using MERN
portfolio.description: A MERN-based social media application enabling users to share noteworthy life events, leveraging technologies such as React + Redux, Node, Express.js, and MongoDB.

portfolio.title: Cloud Native Monitoring using Devops
portfolio.description: Created a Monitoring Application using Python and Flask to enable real-time tracking of system performance metrics, utilizing tools such as Python, Flask, Docker, Git, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Amazon ECR and Amazon EKS.
